tosdr.case: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
quoteText: By purchasing a Nitro subscription, you authorize us to charge your Payment Method on a recurring (e.g., monthly or yearly) basis for the applicable Nitro subscription charge, any and all taxes or possible transaction fees, and any other charges incurred in connection with your use of the Nitro subscription service. Your payment to Discord will automatically renew at the end of your applicable subscription period, unless you cancel your subscription before the end of the current subscription period.
